title: Junior Angular Developer
description:
Junior Angular Developer

- Hybrid, Central London 2 days a week

- £40,000 to £45,000

- ASAP



Join a leading and innovative fintech company that is transforming technology in financial services. As a Junior Angular Developer, you'll be part of a collaborative team of approximately six developers working on cutting-edge products used by some of the world's largest financial institutions - a client base that continues to expand.

This role is a fantastic opportunity to kickstart your career in software development and grow into a Fullstack Developer. You'll work on exciting new product development while enhancing your technical skills across both back-end and front-end technologies.











We are looking for Developers who are passionate problem-solvers with experience in product development that thrive in collaborative environments. While experience with the following technologies is beneficial, a willingness to learn and grow is just as important:







This role will be perfect for individuals who are eager to learn, collaborative, and proactive in solving problems. If you're looking to take your first or next step in a supportive environment that fosters growth, this is the opportunity for you.

What's On Offer

Annual salary paying £40,000-£45,000
A clear pathway to become a Fullstack Developer.
Hybrid working model (2 days in-office, 3 days remote).
Private medical insurance for you and your family.
Enhanced statutory payments and x4 salary life assurance.
Cycle to work scheme and more.

If you would like to learn more, please through the advert and we will be in touch to discuss in more detail.

title: Angular Developer

title: Angular Developer
description:
Im exclusively working with a client building one-of-a-kind cloud first solution to help healthcare professionals get the kit they need, when they need it, and they must do a good job of it, supporting, connecting, and automating over £6 billion+ in transactions in the UK alone.

Theyve a diverse technical environment covering websites, android mobile and cloud, fantastic central offices and a remote first attitude to working



Youll be joining a small team working on big things. Youll be working in sprints to deliver web services, dashboards and connecting to services via API, designing new features and working on the UX to create easy to use, easy to access web services.



Youll be comfortable with front end stuff including JavaScript and ideally typescript and have some exposure to a major Front-end frameworks like Angular or Vue and want to develop your experience further.

Youll have some exposure in developing web solutions in .net as their core solutions are Microsoft based (including some cross platform stuff with Maui) but you should have a mixed programming exposure/interest

How To Apply

Apply here or search for Sam Birtwistle on a popular professional social media platform that sounds like blinkedIn where you will find my contact details at the top of my profile page

Dont worry if you CV isnt up to date, well deal with that later if needed
